T02D1592:111b-1: badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D1592:111b-3: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1592:111b-4: dpal rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1592:111b-5: dang po rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar aa
T02D1592:111b-6: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge
T02D1592:111b-7: hr'i:de'i 'od kyis lus bdag dang gzhan dang zhing sbyang
T02D1592:111b-8: bar bya'o // de nas 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje phag mo dang /
T02D1592:111b-9: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D1592:111b-14: de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D1592:111b-15: rdzes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1592:111b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya ste /
T02D1592:111b-18: de nas skyabs su 'gro ba bya'o //
T02D1592:111b-22: btang snyoms bsgoms la byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1592:111b-23: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharmm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1592:111b-26: zla ba dang yi ge dang /
T02D1592:111b-27: thig le yang mi snang bar byas nas stong pa nyid du bsgoms la /
T02D1592:111b-28: auom [?] sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a
T02D1592:111b-29: ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o
T02D1592:111b-30: // de nas pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D1592:111b-31: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor //
T02D1592:111b-32: de'i steng du hr'i: dmar po las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang /
T02D1592:111b-33: lte ba la nyi ma la gnas pa'i hr'i: dmar po /
T02D1592:111b-34: de'i 'od zer gyis 'gro ba sbyangs te /
T02D1592:111b-36: de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1592:111b-37: rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D1592:111b-38: sku mdog dmar ba zhal mche ba gtsigs pa skra grol ba /
T02D1592:111b-40: gcer bu dum bu'i ske rags kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1592:111b-41: phyag g-yas na gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D1592:111b-42: g-yon na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa dang kha
T02D1592:111b-43: tv'am ga bsnams pa bskal pa'i me lta bu'i gzi
T02D1592:112a-1: ba chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D1592:112a-2: nyi ma la gnas pa'i hr'i: sa snying ga byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1592:112a-5: snying gar h'um nag po bsam par bya'o //
T02D1592:112a-6: de nas yi ge bzhi las 'od zer 'phros pas
T02D1592:112a-7: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1592:112a-10: ye shes sems dpa' bskul te spyan drangs la yi ge so so la thim par bsam mo //
T02D1592:112a-11: de'i rjes la aom a'a: h'um hr'i: h'um sarbba yo
T02D1592:112a-12: gi n'i k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a
T02D1592:112a-15: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharma badzra shuddho& ham /
T02D1592:112a-16: zhes pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
T02D1592:112a-17: de nas lte bar aom bam rdo rje phag mo /
T02D1592:112a-18: snying gar ham yom ya mi ni /
T02D1592:112a-19: khar aom hrim mom rmongs byed ma'o //
T02D1592:112a-20: mgo bor aom hrem hrim skyong byed ma'o //
T02D1592:112a-21: spyi gtsug tu aom h'um h'um skrag byed ma'o //
T02D1592:112a-22: yan lag thams cad la phat phat tsandi ka'o //
T02D1592:112a-23: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba'i phyir /
T02D1592:112a-24: snying ga'i hr'i: las 'od 'phros pas rdo rje phag mo spyan drangs te /
T02D1592:112a-25: snying po'i phyag rgya bstan la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas gnyis su med par bya ste /
T02D1592:112a-26: aom yo ga shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1592:112a-27: zhes pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
T02D1592:112a-28: de nas hr'i:'i 'od kyis rgyal ba rigs lnga spyan drangs te /
T02D1592:112a-30: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1592:112a-31: ji ltar mchod cing gsol ba ltar //
T02D1592:112a-32: bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1592:112a-33: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D1592:112a-34: zhes gsol ba btab pas rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas
T02D1592:112a-35: mkha' 'gro ma lnga phyag na bum pa thogs pa
T02D1592:112a-36: byung nas / rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D1592:112a-37: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas shing //
T02D1592:112a-38: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02D1592:112a-39: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D1592:112a-41: ji ltar bltams pa zhes pas sngags kyi dbang bskur la /
T02D1592:112a-42: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam mo //
T02D1592:112a-43: de nas bdud rtsi myang ba dang /
T02D1592:112a-46: de nas rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pas ci nus su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1592:112b-0: skyo bar gyur na snying po @112b dang nye ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1592:112b-1: thun bar rnams la skad cig mas lhar bsam /
T02D1592:112b-2: dbang dang bzlas pa'i bar du bya'o /
T02D1592:112b-3: thun tha ma la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang /
T02D1592:112b-4: yi ge brgya pa dang smon lam gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1592:112b-5: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
